code: import axios from'axios';import{FIND_USER,USERS_LOADING}from'./types';import{returnErrors}from'./errorActions';export var findUser=function findUser(user){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setUserLoading());axios.get('/api/users').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:FIND_USER,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var setUserLoading=function setUserLoading(){return{type:USERS_LOADING};};
